title: Authorizes industrial development agencies created for the benefit of a town to provide scholarships to certain institutions offering business studies
summary: Authorizes industrial development agencies created for the benefit of a town to provide scholarships and/or intern support to certain students in a business related field of study leading to an associate's, bachelor's or master's degree.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law and the education law, in relation to authorizing industrial development agencies created for the benefit of a town to establish a scholarship program for students engaged in a course of study for an associate's, bachelor's or master's degree in a business related field
